brand_names: QIAN LI ZHUI FENG PAIN RELIEVING
adverse_reactions: Report any unexpected side effects from the use of this product to the FDA MedWatch Program
dosage_administration: Directions ■ adults and children 3 years of age and older: apply several drops and rub Into the affected area not more than 3 to 4 times daily ■ children under 3 years of age: consult your physician
indications: Uses For the temporary relief of minor aches and pains of muscles and joints due to: ■ simple backache ■ arthritis ■ strains ■ bruises ■ sprains
